textContent:
What I wanted at 22 is different than what I wanted at 32 

Intellect and sense of humor - make me think differently and make me laugh 

Our needs didn't continue to shift in the same direction 

I needed things from him that I thought were wants (not able to say I need this).

Convinced myself the things I wanted were nice to have and could survive absent those things under the hope it could change... Or needed very very little to survive 

Became independent. Did most things alone. Different professional successes  

Give up once I've decided you're my person and if you're not struggling you're not living. Life is supposed to be hard. 

Right and wrong 
Then gray
And no say it's not serving you and trust them

It's terrifying to leave. Have I tried hard enough. What if I did this or that? Something really hurtful happened - clear disconnect that wasn't really reconcilable

You don't have to stay in this. You'll be fine. 
And then it just had to happen 

That is what it feels like to connect with someone of the opposite sex. I can feel seen, heard supported attracted valued... 

It's okay to walk away from this proces

What is marriage? Vows that are forever 

You will have 3 marriages in your life you just have to decide if they will be with the same person.... 

Do right by the people you love and that takes a lot of different forms. Trying to do a lot at once and is that possible? Prioritize in a lot of different areas. Know myself. Know my needs... Then sussing through the rest. Not gonna be resolved in right timing.... Couldn't force and it just needed
title: Advice from Friends
textContentHtml:
What I wanted at 22 is different than what I wanted at 32 


Intellect and sense of humor - make me think differently and make me laugh 


Our needs didn't continue to shift in the same direction 


I needed things from him that I thought were wants (not able to say I need this).


Convinced myself the things I wanted were nice to have and could survive absent those things under the hope it could change... Or needed very very little to survive 


Became independent. Did most things alone. Different professional successes  


Give up once I've decided you're my person and if you're not struggling you're not living. Life is supposed to be hard. 


Right and wrong 

Then gray

And no say it's not serving you and trust them


It's terrifying to leave. Have I tried hard enough. What if I did this or that? Something really hurtful happened - clear disconnect that wasn't really reconcilable


You don't have to stay in this. You'll be fine. 

And then it just had to happen 


That is what it feels like to connect with someone of the opposite sex. I can feel seen, heard supported attracted valued... 


It's okay to walk away from this proces


What is marriage? Vows that are forever 


You will have 3 marriages in your life you just have to decide if they will be with the same person.... 


Do right by the people you love and that takes a lot of different forms. Trying to do a lot at once and is that possible? Prioritize in a lot of different areas. Know myself. Know my needs... Then sussing through the rest. Not gonna be resolved in right timing.... Couldn't force and it just needed
